Posts.Content: I agree with you! Have you tried to tell the doctor remember they are no different then us they are human not gods.  Therefore, you should feel free to express yourself if not get a new one. Loretta
Posts.Title: Doctor care after chemo

Posts.Content: I have ellected to have chemo first before I have a double mastecomy.  My tumor is only 1.9 cm and is only in one breast but I want to reduce my chances the most so I have decided to remove both after my chemo.  Has any one else chose this path.
Posts.Title: bctn surgery first or chemo

Posts.Content: Does anyone else out there find it hard to get the doctor's to tell you what you should do?  I find this to be a very trying time and all they keep doing is giving me options.  I don't want options I want to know what I have to do to live.  They should list all your options in writing from best chance to least, that would make things easier, and I say in writing because I am finding out that I can't remeber anything and I have not even started chemo yet, just diagnosed 6/7/12 that date that will forever haunt me.
Posts.Title: Doctor's Suggestions?
